verses.verse: Now these are the <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, the <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, and the <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H3925>teach<s%> <S%H6213>you<s%>, that you might do them in the <S%H776>land<s%> where you <S%H5674>go<s%> to possess <S%H3423>it<s%>:

That you might <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H8104>keep<s%> all his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and his <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, which I <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H1121>you<s%>, you, and your son, and your <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>, all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H2416>life<s%>; and that your <S%H3117>days<s%> may be <S%H748>prolonged<s%>.

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H3478>therefore<s%>, O Israel, and <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3190>it<s%>; that it may be well with <S%H7235>you<s%>, and that you may increase <S%H3966>mightily<s%>, as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> has <S%H1696>promised<s%> <S%H776>you<s%>, in the land that <S%H2100>flows<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>.
<S%H8085>Hear<s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3068>Lord<s%>:
And you shall <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with all your <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and with all your <S%H5315>soul<s%>, and with all your <S%H3966>might<s%>.
And these <S%H1697>words<s%>, which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%>, shall be in your <S%H3824>heart<s%>:

And you shall teach them <S%H8150>diligently<s%> unto your <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and shall <S%H1696>talk<s%> of them when you <S%H3427>sit<s%> in your <S%H1004>house<s%>, and when you <S%H3212>walk<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%>, and when you lie <S%H7901>down<s%>, and when you rise <S%H6965>up<s%>.
And you shall <S%H7194>bind<s%> them for a <S%H226>sign<s%> upon your <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and they shall be as <S%H2903>frontlets<s%> between your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.
And you shall <S%H3789>write<s%> them upon the <S%H4201>door-posts<s%> of your <S%H1004>house<s%>, and on your <S%H8179>gates<s%>.

And it shall <S%H3068>be<s%>, when the Lord your <S%H430>God<s%> shall have <S%H935>brought<s%> you into the <S%H776>land<s%> which he <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, to <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, to <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>, which you built <S%H1129>not<s%>,

And <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of all <S%H2898>good<s%> <S%H4390>things<s%>, which you fill <S%H953>not<s%>, and wells <S%H2672>dug<s%>, which you <S%H2672>dig<s%> <S%H3754>not<s%>, vineyards and olive <S%H2132>trees<s%>, which you <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H398>not<s%>; when you shall have eaten and be <S%H7646>full<s%>;

Then <S%H8104>beware<s%> lest you <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, which brought you <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage<s%>.
You shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H7650>him<s%>, and shall swear by his <S%H8034>name<s%>.
You shall not <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, of the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> which are round about <S%H5439>you<s%>;

(For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is a <S%H7067>jealous<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H639>you<s%>) lest the anger of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> be <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H8045>you<s%>, and destroy you from off the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>.
You shall not <S%H5254>tempt<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, as you <S%H5254>tempted<s%> him in <S%H4532>Massah<s%>.

You shall <S%H8104>diligently<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and his <S%H5713>testimonies<s%>, and his <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, which he has commanded <S%H6680>you<s%>.

And you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H3477>right<s%> and <S%H2896>good<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: that it may be <S%H3190>well<s%> with <S%H935>you<s%>, and that you may go in and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%>,
To cast <S%H1920>out<s%> all your <S%H341>enemies<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>you<s%>, as the Lord has <S%H1696>spoken<s%>.

And when your <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7592>asks<s%> you in time to <S%H4279>come<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What mean the <S%H5713>testimonies<s%>, and the <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, and the <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> has commanded <S%H6680>you<s%>?

Then you shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto your <S%H1121>son<s%>, We were <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H5650>bondmen<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> brought us <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>:

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>showed<s%> <S%H226>signs<s%> and <S%H4159>wonders<s%>, <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H7451>severe<s%>, upon <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, upon <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and upon all his <S%H1004>household<s%>, before our <S%H5869>eyes<s%>:
And he brought us <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H935>there<s%>, that he might bring us in, to <S%H5414>give<s%> us the <S%H776>land<s%> which he <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto our <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us to <S%H6213>do<s%> all these <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, to <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, for our <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H3117>always<s%>, that he might preserve us <S%H2421>alive<s%>, as it is at this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And it shall be our <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, if we <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> all <S%H2063>these<s%> <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, as he has commanded <S%H6680>us<s%>.
